fields.inlineHelpText: Enter the field name that stores a Document Id to include the document(s) in the DocGen Package. (Use the Field Tagger with Document Type set to Excel.)
fields.label: Addendum Doc Id Field
fields.name: Loop__AddendumDocIdField__c

fields.inlineHelpText: Allows the user to choose to store the DocGen Package output as determined by the Attach As field.
fields.label: Allow output to be attached
fields.name: Loop__AllowOutputAttachment__c

fields.inlineHelpText: This allows the user to add attachments from the associated objects to the end of the DocGen Package.
fields.label: Allow Attachments
fields.name: Loop__Allow_Attachments__c

fields.inlineHelpText: Attachment will create a Salesforce attachment; LOOP Storage will create a document in the LOOP Storage interface; Content and Content - User Selected will create a Content document in the appropriate Workspace.
fields.label: Store As
fields.name: Loop__Attach_As__c

fields.inlineHelpText: This will default the 'Additional To' field when delivering the DocGen Package via email. Use the Field Tagger to use dynamic email addresses.
fields.label: Additional To
fields.name: Loop__DDP_Additional_To__c

fields.inlineHelpText: This will default the 'BCC' field when delivering the DocGen Package via email. Use the Field Tagger to use dynamic email addresses.
fields.label: BCC
fields.name: Loop__DDP_BCC__c

fields.inlineHelpText: This will default the 'CC' field when delivering the DocGen Package via email.Use the Field Tagger to use dynamic email addresses.
fields.label: CC
fields.name: Loop__DDP_CC__c

fields.inlineHelpText: For internal use.
fields.label: Description
fields.name: Loop__Description__c

fields.inlineHelpText: Limit the number of enclosures that can be selected.
fields.label: Enclosure Limit
fields.name: Loop__Enclosure_Limit__c

fields.inlineHelpText: If selected, the user cannot send this DocGen Package to a Salesforce email template.
fields.label: Exclude Email Delivery
fields.name: Loop__Exclude_Email__c

fields.inlineHelpText: If selected, the user cannot send this DocGen Package to LOOP. LOOP is a PDF conversion service. It can be used to upload ad hoc documents to convert to PDF and combine with other documents into one PDF.
fields.label: Exclude LOOP Delivery
fields.name: Loop__Exclude_LOOP__c

fields.inlineHelpText: If selected, the user cannot send this DocGen Package to the DocGen Queue. The DocGen Queue allows DocGen Packages to be generated behind the scenes and allows for inter-department fulfillment options.
fields.label: Exclude DocGen Queue Delivery
fields.name: Loop__Exclude_Queue__c

fields.inlineHelpText: Use this value with the filter and filtertype querystring parameters on your custom button or link to filter which DocGen Packages are listed. Filtertype options are equals, doesnotequal, startswith, endswith, contains, and doesnotcontain.
fields.label: Filter
fields.name: Loop__Filter__c

fields.inlineHelpText: Once activated, your report will be emailed out at this frequency.
fields.label: Frequency
fields.name: Loop__Frequency__c

fields.inlineHelpText:
Files from selected article types can be included at DocGen Package run time.

Use Shift or Ctrl to select multiple options. Use Ctrl to deselect.
fields.label: Optional Articles
fields.name: Loop__KA_Optional__c

fields.inlineHelpText:
All files from selected Article Types will be included with the DocGen Package automatically.

Use Shift or Ctrl to select multiple options. Use Ctrl to deselect.
fields.label: Required Articles
fields.name: Loop__KA_Required__c

fields.inlineHelpText:
Files from selected article types can be included as separate attachments at run time. (If an article has more than one file field, the files will be listed as separate options.)

Use Shift or Ctrl to select multiple options. Use Ctrl to deselect.
fields.label: Separate Optional Articles
fields.name: Loop__KA_Separate__c

fields.inlineHelpText: Once activated, this field will be updated each time the report is sent out.
fields.label: Last Sent
fields.name: Loop__LastSent__c

fields.inlineHelpText: If no options are selected, the DocGen Package will be available for all deployment types.
fields.label: Limit Availability
fields.name: Loop__Limit_Availability__c

fields.inlineHelpText: Use Limit Availability instead.
fields.label: Limit Deployment (Deprecated)
fields.name: Loop__Limit_Deployment__c

fields.inlineHelpText: This will override the user's locale when running a DocGen Package. The value must be a valid locale (e.g. en-us, en-uk, fr-ca, etc.). Use the Field Tagger to dynamically set the locale.
fields.label: Locale
fields.name: Loop__Locale__c

fields.inlineHelpText: This is a Salesforce Report Id. The first column (# zero) of the report must be the lead, contact, or user id that the report will be emailed to. Each consecutive column can be used in a report filter as !param# where # is the column number.
fields.label: Mass Email Report to
fields.name: Loop__MassEmailReport__c

fields.inlineHelpText: Enter the API name of the custom object this DocGen Package should be available from.
fields.label: Object API Name
fields.name: Loop__Object_Name__c

fields.inlineHelpText: DocGen Package Templates will be processed using this version of Office. This does not need to match the version that the DocGen Package Templates were created/modified in.
fields.label: Office Version
fields.name: Loop__Office_Version__c

fields.inlineHelpText: This is the name for the DocGen Package output file. Use the Field Tagger to make this dynamic. Examples: "Quote <<Opportunity_Quote_Num>>" or "<<Account_Name>> Proposal".
fields.label: Output Filename
fields.name: Loop__Output_Filename__c

fields.inlineHelpText: Semi-colon delimited list of at most 6 values. Defaults to: initializing docgen package; security check; acquiring data; looping documents; combining docgen package; routing docgen package. For no processing text, type null.
fields.label: Processing Text
fields.name: Loop__ProcessingText__c

fields.inlineHelpText: Documents sent to the Queue from this DocGen Package will be stored in this Document Folder.
fields.label: Queue Folder Id
fields.name: Loop__Queue_Folder_Id__c

fields.inlineHelpText: This field has been deprecated. Use the Related Object list instead. (Values in this field will overwrite the Related Object list.)
fields.label: Related Objects (Deprecated)
fields.name: Loop__RelatedObjects__c

fields.inlineHelpText: If data in a Salesforce report contains bad/invalid characters, checking this option will remove them from the data.
fields.label: Remove Invalid Characters
fields.name: Loop__Remove_Invalid_Characters__c

fields.inlineHelpText: The LOOP It delivery option will be renamed to this value.
fields.label: Rename LOOP It
fields.name: Loop__RenameLOOP__c

fields.inlineHelpText: If selected, the user must select an attachment to be appended to the DocGen Package. This option requires Allow Attachments to also be selected.
fields.label: Require Attachment
fields.name: Loop__RequireAttachment__c

fields.inlineHelpText: If selected, the user must select a contact to be used with this DocGen Package.
fields.label: Require Contact Selection
fields.name: Loop__RequireContact__c

fields.inlineHelpText: The DocGen Package output will be stored as specified in the Attach As field.
fields.label: Require output to be attached
fields.name: Loop__RequireOutputAttachment__c

fields.inlineHelpText: If monthly is selected and you specify a day between 29 and 31, the report runs only in the months that contain that day.
fields.label: Day
fields.name: Loop__Day__c

fields.inlineHelpText: This is a Salesforce Report. The first column (# zero) of the report must be the lead, contact, or user id that the report will be emailed to. Each consecutive column can be used in a report filter as !param# where # is the column number.
fields.label: Mass Recipient Report
fields.name: Loop__Mass_Email_Report_to__c

fields.inlineHelpText: For information on Organization-Wide Addresses, search the Salesforce Help site for organization-wide addresses.
fields.label: Org-Wide Email
fields.name: Loop__Org_Wide_Email__c
